author: adapdoaosdaoda
name: ModalPatch
description: Demonstrates and enables Select components in discord.py Modals using the Label component introduced in discord.py 2.6. Shows how to properly wrap TextInput and Select components in Labels for use in modals, following Discord's official API specification.
install_msg:
✅ **ModalPatch Installed**

This cog demonstrates Select components in Modals using discord.py 2.6+ features.

**Requirements:**
• discord.py >= 2.6.0 (for discord.ui.Label support)
• Red-DiscordBot >= 3.5.0

**Features:**
• Demonstrates Label-wrapped TextInput components
• Demonstrates Label-wrapped Select components
• Version compatibility checking

**Commands:**
• `[p]modalpatchstatus` - Check discord.py version compatibility
• `[p]modalpatchtest` - Test modal with Label and Select components

**Note:** As of discord.py 2.6, Select components must be wrapped in Label components to work in modals. This follows Discord's official API specification.
short: Demonstrates Select components in discord.py 2.6+ Modals using Labels
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any user data. It only demonstrates modal component usage.
